  • Packages that use ColourMap 
    Package Description
    mgui.geometry.volume  
    mgui.image.util  
    mgui.interfaces
    This package contains all main interface objects (object which provides user interations) for ModelGUI.
    mgui.interfaces.graphs
    Provides an interface for user interaction with graph objects.
    mgui.interfaces.maps
    Provides a set a maps for use by ModelGUI objects.
    mgui.interfaces.plots.mgui  
    mgui.interfaces.shapes

      class  ContinuousColourMap
      Maps colours to values based upon a set of anchors (expressed on the range [0:1]) and an interpolator.

      Colour map for discrete 1-to-1 mappings (integers to colours).
